markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Blast Foot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1366)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These prosthetic feet and legs, created by dwarven alchemists and spellcasters together, are engraved with simple but effective evocation symbols on the ball and heel, empowering you to leap to great heights and blast foes with your feet.

<document level="2" id="action-1054" />

<document level="2" id="action-1055" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blast Foot
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blast Foot (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

You can use the first activation once per minute, and the second activation unleashes a 30-foot cone that deals 8d6 damage.
name: Blast Foot (Greater)
